Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
The ServerController class is the central authority for managing active player sessions and available game matches. It handles player registration, session authentication, and match creation

This class supports concurrent access and is thread-safe

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerController

      public ServerController(int RMIPort, int SocketPort, int connectionTimeout) throws NetworkException, UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Constructs a new ServerController with empty session and match registries
      Throws:
      NetworkException
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException

  • Method Details

    • addClientControllerAction

      public void addClientControllerAction(ClientControllerAction clientControllerAction)
      Adds a client-issued controller-level action to the execution queue.

      This supports the Command Pattern for decoupling network logic from game logic.

      Parameters:
      clientControllerAction - the action to enqueue

    • getUsernameList

      public List<String> getUsernameList()
      Retrieves a list of all currently registered usernames.
      Returns:
      a list of usernames of connected clients

    • getPlayerVirtualClient

      public VirtualClient getPlayerVirtualClient(String username, UUID token)
      Retrieves the VirtualClient associated with a given username and token

      This method validates that the session exists and that the token matches the one stored in the corresponding ClientSession. If the session is not found or the token is invalid, a RuntimeException is thrown

      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the client
      token - the authentication token issued at login
      Returns:
      the VirtualClient associated with the username
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no valid session is found for the username and token

    • registerRMISession

      public UUID registerRMISession(String username, ClientInterface playerStub) throws UsernameAlreadyTakenException, IllegalArgumentException
      Registers a new player session for the specified username and connection type

      This method creates a new ClientSession containing a VirtualClient associated with the specified connection type. If a session already exists for the given username, the method throws an exception

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the connecting player
      playerStub - the networking interface used by the client
      Returns:
      the unique session token associated with the new session
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - if a session already exists for the username
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username is null or empty

    • registerSocketSession

      public UUID registerSocketSession(String username, VirtualSocketClient virtualSocketClient) throws UsernameAlreadyTakenException, IllegalArgumentException
      Registers a new player session for the specified username and connection type

      This method creates a new ClientSession containing a VirtualClient associated with the specified connection type. If a session already exists for the given username, the method throws an exception

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the connecting player
      Returns:
      the unique session token associated with the new session
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - if a session already exists for the username
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username is null or empty

    • ping

      public void ping(String username, UUID token) throws NetworkException
      Receives a ping from the client to keep the session alive. Updates the session's last ping timestamp and responds with a PongAction.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the pinging client
      token - the session token for authentication
      Throws:
      NetworkException - if the pong action cannot be sent

    • createMatch

      public void createMatch(FlightBoard.Type flightLevel, int numPlayers, String username, UUID token) throws FullLobbyException, UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Creates a new match with the specified flight difficulty level

      This method initializes a new GameContext, sets the game level based on the provided flight type, and stores the game instance in the availableMatches map using a generated unique match ID

      Parameters:
      flightLevel - the difficulty level for the new match
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException

    • connectPlayerToGame

      public void connectPlayerToGame(String username, UUID token, String matchID) throws RuntimeException, FullLobbyException, UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Enrolls an existing player session to a specific game match

      This method associates the player's VirtualClient with the specified game context, identified by the given match ID. The session must already be registered via registerRMISession(java.lang.String, it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.network.client.rmi.ClientInterface) or via registerSocketSession(java.lang.String, it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.network.server.socket.VirtualSocketClient)

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to enroll
      matchID - the identifier of the match the player wants to join
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the match ID is invalid or the session is not found
      FullLobbyException - if the player cannot join this match
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException

    • getAvailableMatches

      public Map<String,List<String>> getAvailableMatches(String username, UUID token)
      Retrieves a map of available matches that the player can join Each entry in the map represents a match, where the key is the match ID (gameId) and the value is a list of usernames of the players currently connected to that match.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      token - the session token associated with the player
      Returns:
      a map where each key is a match ID and the corresponding value is a list of player usernames
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the session is invalid

    • receiveAction

      public void receiveAction(ClientGameAction action, UUID token)
      Receives a game action issued by a client and dispatches it to the corresponding game context.
      Parameters:
      action - the client-issued game action
      token - the session token of the issuing player
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the token is invalid or no game context is associated

    • sendAction

      public void sendAction(String username, ServerAction action) throws NetworkException
      Sends a server-generated action to a registered client.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the recipient
      action - the action to send
      Throws:
      NetworkException - if the action could not be delivered

    • sendUnregisteredAction

      public void sendUnregisteredAction(VirtualClient virtualClient, ServerAction action) throws NetworkException
      Sends an action to a client that is not yet associated with a username or session.

      This is typically used during the initial handshake or match creation.

      Parameters:
      virtualClient - the target virtual client
      action - the action to send
      Throws:
      NetworkException - if the action could not be sent

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down both RMI and socket servers.

      This should be called when the server is terminating. Exceptions during shutdown are logged but do not interrupt the process.
